attributes.action: Create legal motocross/offroad tracks in west yorkshire
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
hello,
i am writing to ask you to get motocross / off road bike tracks biult in west yorkshire any maybe other places.

there is plenty off space that can be used - disused quarries , stacks, pits etc.

there is not many tracks around and some people dont have transport for a 1hour trip to their nearest track and some kids who ride off road bikes cant afford £15 a time.

if tracks were built "illegal" riding would be very low and drop dramaticly. police and council are always pulling people for riding on parks and fields etc for riding their motobikes, there needs to be some tracks built. 

we could run the tracks once thier built and pay rent look after track mashels and saety etc.
